required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of JS007 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ia Study to Evaluate The Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics And Pharmacodynamics Of Single-dose and Multiple-dose Of JS007 Injection In Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, phase Ia clinical study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetic (PK) profile, pharmacodynamic (PD) profile, immunogenicity and preliminary efficacy of JS007 in the patients with advanced solid tumors who have progressed after standard of care, or lack of effective standard therapeutic regimen. This study is divided into two periods: dose escalation period, dose expansion period.

primary_outcome.description: The maximum tolerated dose (MTD) is defined as the highest dose at which DLT （Dose-Limiting Toxicity）occurs in <1/3 subjects

primary_outcome.time_frame: 21 days after first infusion of study drug
primary_outcome.description: DLT is defined as any of the specified toxicities evaluated as at least possibly related with the study drug within 21 days after the first dose (NCI-CTCAE v5.0)
AE is assessed according to NCI-CTCAE 5.0
SAE（Serious adverse event） is assessed according to NCI-CTCAE 5.0
IrAE is assessed according to NCI-CTCAE 5.0
IrAE is assessed according to NCI-CTCAE 5.0

secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters peak concentration (Cmax);
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters trough concentration (Ctrough)
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters time to peak (Tmax);

secondary_outcome.measure: area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve (AUC0-t )
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve (AUC0-t )

secondary_outcome.measure: area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve (AUC0-inf)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve (AUC0-inf);
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters elimination half-life (t1/2)
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters clearance rate (CL);
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; apparent volume of distribution(Vd)
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters volume of distribution (Vss)
Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile: drug concentration in individual subject at different time points after administration; pharmacokinetic parameters mean retention time (MRT)

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of lymphocyte in peripheral blood before and after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The number of lymphocyte in peripheral blood before and after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of lymphocyte in peripheral blood before and after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of lymphocyte in peripheral blood before and after administration

other_outcome.description: The efficacy evaluated by the investigator in accordance with RECIST 1.1 criteria (solid tumors), including objective response rate (ORR).
The efficacy evaluated by the investigator in accordance with RECIST 1.1 criteria (solid tumors) , including duration of response (DOR);
The efficacy evaluated by the investigator in accordance with RECIST 1.1 criteria (solid tumors) , including disease control rate (DCR);
The efficacy evaluated by the investigator in accordance with RECIST 1.1 criteria (solid tumors) , including progression-free survival (PFS)
The efficacy evaluated by the investigator in accordance with RECIST 1.1 criteria (solid tumors) , including overall survival (OS);
Expression of CTLA-4 in tumor tissues before administration
Expression of FoxP3 in tumor tissues before administration
Expression of IDO in tumor tissues before administration

other_outcome.measure: mutation of immune related genes in tumor tissues before administration
other_outcome.description: mutation of immune related genes in tumor tissues before administration

other_outcome.measure: expression of immune related genes in tumor tissues before administration
other_outcome.description: expression of immune related genes in tumor tissues before administration

facility.name: Ruijin Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai Jiaotong University School of Medical
